text: William Kennedy Gibson (born 1876) was an Irish professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:Irish association footballers (before 1923) Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Cliftonville F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bishop Auckland F.C. players Category:Sunderland Royal Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: William Gibson (footballer, born 1876)
